fields.name: vehicle_id
fields.description: Identifies a vehicle, such as a bus or a train consist. If possible, this should match other internal agency vehicle IDs and the GTFS-realtime VehicleDescriptor.

fields.name: vehicle_start
fields.description: The time at which the vehicle or train consist is first in operation (i.e., when the consist has been created). Required if Train_car is used.

fields.name: vehicle_end
fields.description: The time at which the vehicle or train consist no longer exists (i.e., the consist is separated or modified). Only used if Train_car is used.

fields.name: facility_name
fields.description: Name or internal agency ID for the facility where the vehicle is generally held.

fields.name: capacity_seated
fields.description: Number of seats on the vehicle. Used if Train_car is not used.

fields.name: wheelchair_capacity
fields.description: Number of wheelchair spaces on the vehicle. Used if Train_car is not used.

fields.name: capacity_bike
fields.description: Number of bike spaces on the vehicle. Used if Train_car is not used.

fields.name: bike_rack
fields.description: Indicates if the vehicle has a useable bike rack. Used if Train_car is not used.

fields.name: capacity_standing
fields.description: Standing capacity of the vehicle set by the manufacturer. Used if Train_car is not used.

name: vehicles.schema.json
description: Vehicles, including buses and train consists, with descriptive information.
